name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 30, Xinyu, Jiangxi. Due to the rapid development of online ride-hailing services, the living space of local taxi drivers has been further compressed, so the drivers went on strike and stopped operating, holding national flags outside the government to seek help.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen added: Iron fences piled up near Xinjiekou

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Supplement: At midnight on January 1 this year, Xinjiekou held a grand New Year's Eve celebration, with crowds pouring into the island around the Sun Yat-sen statue and releasing a large number of balloons to celebrate.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a judge in a certain place snatched a lawyer's cell phone. The family members involved in the case angrily scolded the judge: "In the past six months, I have investigated the homes of all the people handling the cases. I know everything about how many people are in the family, how many children, and where the elderly live. The hostility in the whole society is caused by judicial injustice. I don't rule out what I can do. I can sacrifice my life, but I don't know if I can exchange it for fairness and justice. I only have one request now, return the lawyer's cell phone."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 30th, Xianyang Sunac: Because Sunac delayed the delivery of houses, the owners gathered to defend their rights and shouted slogans in unison. Some owners climbed to the edge of the roof and jumped off the building to defend their rights.
The video shows that there are several police officers at the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution: Several young people in Yishui County, Linyi, Shandong Province, hacked at each other with machetes and weapons similar to long-handled broadswords, causing at least one person to fall to the ground with blood all over his head
⚠️ Bloody picture warning

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 30 Weibo Hot Search: People's Daily counts down the top ten keywords for 2024
Charge: Soldiers raced against time to fight floods, but the reality is that the local government fooled around and the disaster relief was very unprofessional. They had time to hang party flags and banners, but no time to bag sand, and directly threw the loose sand into the collapsed river embankment to "solidify the dam."
Upward: The J-35A made its debut at the air show, but the reality was that a car crashed into a crowd in Zhuhai the night before the air show, killing 35 people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, many places in Maoming, Guangdong and Guangxi have returned fruit trees to farmland. Firefighting, judicial, and armed police have been dispatched to forcibly cut down and knock down many forest farms and orchards, including mountaintops, and return forests to farmland. Some farmers' eucalyptus forests were forcibly knocked down when they were about to be harvested, leaving them with nothing. Maoming is the hometown of lychees and longans, but these fruit trees have also been cut down and turned down, and the forests have been returned to farmland.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
What needs to be noted is that the conversion of forests to farmland and rice planting on mountainous hills has cost lives several times, especially in places with abundant rainfall such as Guangdong and Guangxi, where the risk of mudslides cannot be underestimated.
The video shows that this conversion of forests to farmland is mostly carried out in mountain orchards and farms.
On January 22, 24, a landslide occurred in Zhenxiong County, Yunnan, killing 11 people. The local rice planting project was carried out

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Additional video: An old lady knelt down and kowtowed, begging the police and another migrant worker not to cut down her tree. The police stopped them and pulled the old lady away from the tree-cutting site, while the migrant worker continued his tree-cutting work.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution December 30th On Harbin Central Street, two urban management officers snatched peanuts from an old man and scattered them on the ground. A passerby said, "You can just snatch them." The urban management officer said, "He was shortchanging people and what he sold was fake."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Hot search on December 30: Chai Gaochao, former deputy director of the Standing Committee of the People's Congress of Linfen City, Shanxi Province, who worked from a hotel waiter to a deputy department level, was investigated.
According to his public resume, Chai Gaochao had served as: a waiter at Linfen Hotel, a correspondent of the Administrative Section of the Secretariat of the Linfen Prefectural Party Committee, an officer of the Theoretical Section of the Propaganda Department of the Linfen Prefectural Party Committee, and a deputy director and director of the Teaching and Research Section of the Linfen Prefectural Party Committee Lecturer Group.
In May 1993, he served as a member of the Standing Committee and Secretary of the Discipline Inspection Commission of Hongdong County Party Committee; in January 1997, he served as Deputy Secretary and County Magistrate of Hongdong County Party Committee; in April 2000, he served as Secretary of Hongdong County Party Committee; in April 2006, he served as Deputy Director of the Standing Committee of the People's Congress of Linfen City; in August 2011, at the first session of the Third People's Congress of Linfen City, he was re-elected as Deputy Director of the Standing Committee of the People's Congress of Linfen City, and he stepped down in 2016.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution: Truth and facts are not determined by human will, and you can never stop AI from telling the truth
Recently, a netizen tested and found that several domestic AIs gave pertinent answers to the democratic system and the centralized system. He also pointed out that the democratic system is a political system that is generally recognized and pursued in the world today. Although it is not perfect and has some problems, it can better play its advantages and protect the rights and well-being of the people through development and improvement.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the early morning of December 30, a fire broke out near Jiefangbei in Chongqing. The official report said the fire location was an empty electrical appliance warehouse and no one was injured or killed at the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Nanjing government is treating the New Year's Eve as a major threat.
On December 29, several shopping malls in Jiangning, Nanjing were required to close around 22:00 on New Year's Eve and not organize New Year's Eve activities.
The intangible cultural heritage fire pot show originally scheduled for the evening of the 31st by Jinmao City was also forced to be rescheduled to the evening of the 30th. Jinmao City officials responded to netizens on Xiaohongshu: We have received a notice that no activities are allowed on the evening of the 31st.
Even several New Year's Eve concerts that had already sold tickets were forced to cancel

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Many netizens angrily scolded the new Nanjing leader in the Weibo comment area, wishing him to go to jail soon, saying that he would not cry until he was imprisoned.
Some careful netizens found that the new Nanjing Municipal Party Committee Secretary Zhou Hongbo had just taken office this month (December). He studied agricultural entomology as an undergraduate and was later in charge of the pest and disease monitoring station in Guangxi. Before coming to Nanjing, he was the Secretary of the Sanya Municipal Party Committee.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen submission Recently, at Mingrenyuan Middle School in Dazhou City, Sichuan Province, a teacher and a high school girl had multiple incidents in the office, including hugging, kissing, the girl sitting on the teacher's lap, and touching the girl's buttocks. It is suspected that the teacher recorded the kissing process and other indecent videos and spread them (the computer on the computer desk was playing the surveillance video) To protect the privacy of the students involved, the original video will not be released

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 28, a reporter from Free Asia encountered Wolf Warrior diplomats again while filming the Manchester Consulate being splashed with paint. These diplomats demanded to check the journalist's credentials in an imperative tone without law enforcement power on a public road. One of the diplomats kept moving forward to force the journalist to retreat, and warned the journalist that the consulate had privileges and the journalist could not film. However, British law stipulates that public spaces can be freely filmed. The diplomat also threatened the journalist: I know your address

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A netizen’s contribution said that he had discovered temporary study areas for students receiving intravenous drips in several hospitals, where many children were doing their homework while receiving intravenous drips.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, someone towed a car to the entrance of Yuyao Jaguar Land Rover (Yuyao Yize) 4S store and put up a banner to protect their rights. The banner showed that the new Range Rover he bought for 1.705 million yuan had just left the 4S store and had oil leaked all over the floor within 5 kilometers. He was cheated when he picked up the car. Where is justice?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, some netizens have been defending their rights online: Shanghai Jinxiu Huacheng Real Estate Development Co., Ltd. has disregarded laws and regulations, government guidance, and the resolution of the community owners' meeting, and forcibly demolished the wall, which is a bad behavior and injured the security guard! The owners strongly protested against this gangster behavior. 
And hope that the government will intervene in this matter to safeguard the legitimate rights and interests and personal safety of the people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the Yunshang Guanhai property developed by Qingdao Metro has engaged in false advertising, and many owners have posted "rotten house" banners at home to protect their rights.
It is reported that the property promised high-quality housing, complete supporting facilities and a good living environment during its promotion. However, a series of problems emerged after the delivery of the house, including serious substandard housing quality, incomplete supporting facilities, multiple leaks, mold and blackening of the house, cracks in the house, etc.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the Shenzhen Airport police held up banners to escort the artists, and the security guards were in front and behind.
Some netizens found that the on-site police officers were suspected of illegally holding up a "Do Not Disturb" flag with "Airport Police" and a police badge to escort the artists without the accompaniment of the police.
The law stipulates that auxiliary police cannot use police symbols including police badges, and the Shenzhen Airport's behavior may be suspected of being illegal.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, villagers in Mogou Village, Sangping Town, Xixia County, Nanyang City, Henan Province, complained: Mining companies illegally mined marble under the guise of afforestation, and villagers reported it for decades to no avail
Villagers sent a video to report: Local mining companies, under the guise of afforestation, frantically mined and sold marble within the ecological protection zone of the national key public welfare forest area. The entire mountain has been barbarically mined for a long time, and waste soil and waste rocks have been randomly discarded to bury a large number of trees and vegetation, causing serious ecological and environmental pollution
Villagers have reported to relevant departments for decades, and the problem has not been solved so far

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 30, a man received a call from the Inner Mongolia police while on a train to Nanchang. The police asked him what his intention was in posting "Nanchang Uprising, armed revolution" in a WeChat group. They also asked the man what he was going to do in Nanchang, what time he would arrive in Nanchang, where he would stay after arriving in Nanchang, and other questions.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 31, People's Daily: China-US cooperation may not be a panacea, but nothing is impossible.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
South Korean media reported that a couple was dining at a barbecue restaurant in Daelim-dong, Seoul. Because they dissuaded several Chinese customers from smoking in the restaurant, the boyfriend was beaten by several Chinese people, including choking, hitting his head with a beer bottle, and trampling. The boyfriend was injured and the girlfriend was also kicked and beaten.
It was not until the sirens sounded that the men stopped and fled in a car, but only some of them were arrested.
Since 2015, South Korea has implemented a comprehensive smoking ban in all bars, restaurants and cafes, and businesses that fail to implement the ban will face fines.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Bloomberg: China raises public servants' monthly salaries to boost spending.
Many public servants' base monthly salaries have increased by at least 500 yuan, according to people familiar with the matter.
The increase varies depending on the base salary, with one person familiar with the matter saying it is around 5%, and the increase covers teachers, police and government officials.
The Communist Party has not made a public statement on this month's salary increase.
